Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: HaselTweaks
Description:
Included Tweaks:

- Aether Current Helper
- Auto Sorter
- Character Class Switcher
- Commands
- Custom Chat Timestamp
- DTR
- Expert Deliveries
- Forced Cutscene Music
- Hide MSQ Complete
- Keep Screen Awake
- Minimap Adjustments
- Refresh Material List
- Reveal Duty Requirements
- Scrollable Tabs
- Search the markets
- Series Exp Bar
Changelog:
Auto Sorter

- Added: It's now possible to disable rules.
- Fixed: When text commands are unavailable, for example when placing housing furniture, sorting operations will be skipped.
- Fixed: The delete button now also work with the right shift key.

Enhanced Experience Bar

- Fixed: In Update 6.3 the current rank and claimed rank were swapped. Updated the code to reflect the change.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: LeveHelper
Description: A little helper to check which Levequests have been completed and which are missing.
Changelog:
- Added: Accepted levequests will now be shown in yellow text.
- Added: A button to quickly set the filter "Type" to the current players job.
- Changed: The button to set the filter "Location" to the current zone will now only show when the zone is different.
